bibl.title: Reconsidering the Dates of Three Christian Letters: P. Oxy. XVIII 2193, 2194, P. Köln IV 200 and a Reference in the Historia monachorum in Aegypto.
bibl.note: Reconsiders the current dating of the letters in favour of an earlier date of the late fourth or early fifth century.
BLUMELL Lincoln, Reconsidering the Dates of Three Christian Letters: P. Oxy. XVIII 2193, 2194, P. Köln IV 200 and a Reference in the Historia monachorum in Aegypto.
